mapper.select: select A.* from product A where p_class='shop' order by p_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT (p_no, b_no, p_name_ko, p_name_en, p_size, p_model_no, p_release_date, p_release_price, p_category, p_class, p_brand) values(product_no_seq.nextval, #{b_no}, #{p_name_ko, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_name_en, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_size, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_model_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_release_date}, #{p_release_price}, #{p_category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'shop', #{p_brand, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PRODUCT set p_name_ko=#{p_name_ko}, p_name_en=#{p_name_en}, p_model_no = #{p_model_no}, p_release_price = #{p_release_price}, p_release_date = #{p_release_date} where p_no=#{p_no}
mapper.select: select nvl(max(bid_sell), 0) as bid_sell, p.pp_size, p.p_no from product_size p left outer join bidding b on p.pp_size = b.pp_size where p.p_no = #{p_no} group by p.pp_size, p.p_no order by pp_size
select p_no from PRODUCT WHERE rownum = 1 order by p_no desc
